channel.title: Comments on: the mystery Manin-Marcolli monoid

item.title: By: lievenlb
item.dc:creator: lievenlb
item.description: @Jimmy :any bicolored planar tree can be realised as the dessin of a Shabat polynomial (ie. generalised Tchebychev) but the 'question' is whether this can be defined over Q (answer: no!).
item.content:encoded: @Jimmy :any bicolored planar tree can be realised as the dessin of a Shabat polynomial (ie. generalised Tchebychev) but the ‘question’ is whether this can be defined over Q (answer: no!).

item.title: By: Jimmy
item.dc:creator: Jimmy
item.description: Generalized Tchebychev polynomials do the job I believe : https://www.labri.fr/perso/zvonkin/Research/shabzvon.pdf
item.content:encoded:
Generalized Tchebychev polynomials do the job I believe :
https://www.labri.fr/perso/zvonkin/Research/shabzvon.pdf
